lead_paragraph: A survey of corporate directors by PricewaterhouseCoopers finds that board members' attitudes regarding compensation of chief executives is similar to the usual public view of Congress: My representative is fine but those other guys are bad.
snippet: Are chief executives overpaid? A majority of corporate directors appear to think that is the case in other companies. But most directors think their own boards are doing just fine.

headline.main: We Do It Right, but Those Others Don't

abstract: Are chief executives overpaid? A majority of corporate directors appear to think that is the case in other companies. But most directors think their own boards are doing just fine.
